Title: Bad Education
Writer: Mike Makowsky (screenplay), Robert Kolker (based on the New York Magazine article "The Bad Superintendent" by)
Actors: Hugh Jackman, Ray Romano, Welker White, Allison Janney
Plot: The beloved superintendent of New York's Roslyn school district and his staff, friends and relatives become the prime suspects in the unfolding of the single largest public school embezzlement scandal in American history.
Awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 5 wins & 21 nominations.
Production: Automatik Entertainment, Sight Unseen Pictures, HBO Films
